author: brondsem
msg: initial import of my modifications to the old forrestbot webapp
- allow 'sites' and 'logs' to be anywhere in the filesystem and anywhere in URI-space
- automatically get list of sites from 'sites' dir
- means you must do it successfully manually once

author: brondsem
msg: %PWD% is preservered throughout the build, so ctrl-c and regular finishi leaves you in the dir you expect
also lets forrest -f filename.xml work for relatives files

author: brondsem
msg: use location, rather than value for properties where appropriate (works better in windows)

author: crossley
msg: Updated Entity Resolver from pre-release to official

author: crossley
msg: Change "Live" to "Built-With-Forrest". The former was confusing.
